required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Psychometric Characterization of Patients With Cardiac Arrhythmias
clinical_study.official_title: Be-PART: Berlin Psychometric Characterization of Patients With Cardiac ARrhyThmias

brief_summary.textblock: To investigate the influence of different psychological parameters (e.g. depression, anxiety, personality traits, resilience, tolerance of uncertainty or heart beat perception) on treatment outcome and quality of life in patients with cardiac arrythmias.

detailed_description.textblock: This longitudinal observational study examines patients with cardiac arrhythmia (such as atrial fibrillation or atrial flutter) who are undergoing a conventional standard therapy in the Department of Cardiology of the Charité - Universitätsmedizin Berlin, Campus Benjamin Franklin. To examine the impact of psychological symptoms such as anxiety, depression, resilience and risk factors (e.g. neuroticism) on cardiac treatment outcomes, patients are evaluated with a standardized psychological assessment including established questionnaires. The baseline observation is performed before the standard treatment of the arrhythmia (e.g. pharmacological treatment or electrophysiological methods). Follow-up observations are made 3 and 6 month after the cardiological intervention.

primary_outcome.measure: Beck Depression Inventory (BDI) - Change from Baseline at 6 months
primary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline at 6 months (Follow-up) after standard therapy
primary_outcome.description: BDI is a questionnaire measuring depression

secondary_outcome.measure: NEO-FFI personality inventory
secondary_outcome.description: personality inventory measuring neuroticism, extraversion, openness to experience, agreeableness, conscientiousness

secondary_outcome.measure: Electrocardiography (ECG) - Change from Baseline at 6 months
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline at 6 months (Follow-up) after standard therapy
secondary_outcome.description: measuring heart activity and signs of cardiac arrhythmias

secondary_outcome.measure: Heart beat Counting Task by Schandry
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of patients heart beat perception

secondary_outcome.measure: Angstkontrollfragebogen (AKF) - Baseline
secondary_outcome.description: AKF is the German Version of the Anxiety Control Questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: Angstkontrollfragebogen (AKF) - 3 months after standard therapy
secondary_outcome.description: AKF is the German Version of the Anxiety Control Questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: Angstkontrollfragebogen (AKF) - 6 months after standard therapy
secondary_outcome.description: AKF is the German Version of the Anxiety Control Questionnaire

secondary_outcome.measure: Anxiety Sensitivity Index (ASI) - Baseline Anxiety Sensitivity Index (ASI)
secondary_outcome.description: ASI is a Questionnaire measuring anxiety sensitivity

secondary_outcome.measure: Anxiety Sensitivity Index (ASI) - 3 months after standard therapy Anxiety Sensitivity Index (ASI)
secondary_outcome.description: ASI is a Questionnaire measuring anxiety sensitivity

secondary_outcome.measure: Anxiety Sensitivity Index (ASI) - 6 months after standard therapy Anxiety Sensitivity Index (ASI)
secondary_outcome.description: ASI is a Questionnaire measuring anxiety sensitivity

secondary_outcome.measure: Beck Anxiety Inventory (BAI) - Change from Baseline at 6 months
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline at 6 months (Follow-up) after standard therapy
secondary_outcome.description: BAI is a questionnaire measuring anxiety

secondary_outcome.measure: Heart rate variability - Baseline
secondary_outcome.description: heart rate variability is a non-invasive method to measure autonomic nervous system function

secondary_outcome.measure: Heart rate variability - 3 months after standard therapy
secondary_outcome.description: heart rate variability is a non-invasive method to measure autonomic nervous system function

secondary_outcome.measure: Heart rate variability - 6 months after standard therapy
secondary_outcome.description: heart rate variability is a non-invasive method to measure autonomic nervous system function

secondary_outcome.measure: Resilienzskala (RS-13) - Baseline
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire to measure resilience

secondary_outcome.measure: Resilienzskala (RS-13) - 3 months after standard therapy
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire to measure resilience

secondary_outcome.measure: Resilienzskala (RS-13) - 6 months after standard therapy
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire to measure resilience

secondary_outcome.measure: Skala zur allgemeinen Selbstwirksamkeitserwartung (SWE) - Baseline
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire to measure self-efficacy

secondary_outcome.measure: Skala zur allgemeinen Selbstwirksamkeitserwartung (SWE) - 3 months after standard therapy
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire to measure self-efficacy

secondary_outcome.measure: Skala zur allgemeinen Selbstwirksamkeitserwartung (SWE) - 6 months after standard therapy
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire to measure self-efficacy

secondary_outcome.measure: ICD-10-Symptom-Rating (ISR) - Change from Baseline at 6 months
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline at 6 months after standard therapy
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire to assess symptoms of psychiatric disorders

secondary_outcome.measure: Perceived Stress Questionnaire (PSQ) - Change from Baseline at 6 months
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline at 6 months after standard therapy
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire to measure psychological stress perception

secondary_outcome.measure: Body Sensations Questionnaire (BSQ) - Change from Baseline at 6 months
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline at 6 months after standard therapy
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire to measure body sensations related to anxiety

secondary_outcome.measure: Herzangstfragebogen (HAF-17) - Change from Baseline at 6
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline at 6 months after standard therapy
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire to measure anxiety with respect to cardiac symptoms

secondary_outcome.measure: Fragebogen zu Akzeptanz und Handeln II (FAH-II) - Change from Baseline at 6 months
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline at 6 months after standard therapy
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire to measure psychological flexibility

secondary_outcome.measure: Euroquol EQ-5D-3L - Change from Baseline at 6
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Baseline at 6 months after standard therapy
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire to measure quality of life

secondary_outcome.measure: Unsicherheitsintoleranzfragebogen (UI-18)
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire to measure tolerance to uncertainty

study_pop.textblock: Patients diagnosed with cardiac arrythmias without any signs of medium or severe cognitive dysfunction.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Age of majority (min. 18 years old)
- no severe cognitive dysfunction
- diagnosed cardiac arrhythmias
- reason of admission is the treatment of cardiac arrhythmia
Exclusion Criteria:
- medium to severe cognitive dysfunction
- doubt on capacity to give consent
